thread.title: Summit Hotel Properties Announces Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release Date
thread.title_full: Summit Hotel Properties Announces Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release Date - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Summit Hotel Properties Announces Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Release Date
text:
Summit Hotel Properties, Inc.
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Summit Hotel Properties, Inc. (NYSE: INN) (the "Company") today announced that it will report financial results for the third quarter of 2015 on Monday, November 2, 2015 , after the market closes.
The Company will conduct its quarterly conference call on Tuesday, November 3, 2015 , at 9:00 AM ET . To participate in the conference call, please follow the steps below:
On November 3, 2015 , dial 877-930-8101 approximately ten minutes before the call begins ( 8:50 AM ET ). Enter conference identification code 51856806. Please state your full name and company affiliation and you will be connected to the call. A live webcast of the quarterly conference call will be available through the Company's website, www.shpreit.com . A replay of the quarterly conference call webcast will be available until 11:59 PM ET Tuesday, November 10, 2015 by dialing 855-859-2056; conference identification code 51856806. A replay will also be available in the Investor Relations section of the Company's website until February 3 , 2016.
About Summit Hotel Properties
Summit Hotel Properties, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust focused primarily on acquiring and owning premium-branded, select-service hotels in the upscale and upper midscale segments of the lodging industry. As of September 30, 2015 , the Company's portfolio consisted of 95 hotels with a total of 12,175 guestrooms located in 24 states.
For additional information, please visit the Company's website, www.shpreit.com , and follow on Twitter at @SummitHotel_INN.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/summit-hotel-properties-announces-third-quarter-2015-earnings-release-date-300162133.html
